name: tm26
effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Earthquake to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.
flavor_text.platinum: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The user sets off an earthquake that hits all the Pokémon in the battle.
